room.name: Starter Tavern
room.description: You appear in a dark, smelly tavern. You can't pick out any specific conversation amongst the cacophony, but you're sure it's there. The exit to the street is to the west. There is a rusty lantern on the table in front of you. What looks like a door to a storeroom is to the north.

npc.name: Tommy
npc.description: a tall, scruffy man in a brown leather jerkin. He looks a little drunk, but otherwise harmless. He looks like he has something to say.
npc.intro: Name's Tommy the Lip, but you can call me Tommy. Welcome to the world of MiniMUD. I can answer most basic questions that new folks tend to ask.

result.description: You try to punch Tommy the Lip, but miss. Maybe he's not as drunk as he looks.
You push Tommy. He didn't appear to enjoy it as much as you did.
You try to punch Tommy the Lip, but miss. Maybe he's not as drunk as he looks.
Hi. I'm Tommy. Welcome to the tavern. You look new. You should pick up that lantern over there. It might come in handy later.
You should try picking up the lantern.
Nice work. You should go adventuring.
Now that you have a lantern, check out the storeroom to the north.
Nice work. I don't have any other jobs for you. You should go adventuring.
Now that you have completed your first quests, maybe you should try traveling. Type 'north' or 'west' to check out the adjacent areas.

object.name: lantern
object.description: a standard oil-based lantern, covered in rust. It must not be important to anyone.

result.description: You push the lantern and it falls over.
You take the lantern and add it to your inventory
You just completed your first quest step!
You think this belongs to Tommy. Maybe you should talk to him before you take it.

object.name: potion
object.description: a small vial containing a reddish liquid.

room.name: Main Street
room.description: You turn on to Main Street. There isn't much traffic this time of day. To the east is a loud, smelly tavern. To the north is the local church. The light in the doorway indicates that it is open. To the west is the town bank. To the south is a park.

room.name: Storeroom
room.description: You quietly sneak into the storeroom. It is lined with the skulls of sacrificed animals. There is a pentagram painted on the floor in blood. You wonder what exactly is in the meat pie. To the south is the door back into the main Tavern. There is a dagger on the floor.

object.name: dagger
object.description: a shiny dagger, covered in dried blood. It must have been used on the animals.

result.description: You take the dagger and add it to your inventory

room.name: Church
room.description: You enter the main worship area of a church. Rows of pews led up to an altar and a pedestal. In the back of the church, stairs lead down. A door to the south leads back out to Main Street. A font of holy water shimmers in the back of the room.

npc.name: Theodore
npc.description: a stout, balding man in golden priests' robes. Around his neck is a chain holding a giant, shiny religious symbol.
npc.intro: I am Theodore, the head priest of this glorius church. Welcome!

result.description: Hello there, my son. Welcome to my church. As you have probably discovered, our town seems to attract trouble. The town wizard can probably help us, but only if we can find a champion worthy of asking. Might you be the champion we're looking for? If you think you're up to snuff, head down the stairs and take the test of faith. If you pass, you just might be able to save us!
If you think you're up to the task, head downstairs and take the Test of Faith.
Praise the Gods. You have completed The Test! You may yet be our savior.
Praise the Gods. You have completed The Test! You may yet be our savior.

object.name: font
object.description: a bowl on a pedestal, filled with water blessed by the church's head priest. It looks delicious. Maybe you should try using the font.

result.description: You drink from the font of holy water.

room.name: Town Bank
room.description: The town bank is pretty standard for this part of the world. A row of teller stations with granite counter tops separates the main entryway from the vault area. A haze of dust is emanating from the open vault door. The bank employees are moving around frantically.

npc.name: Charles
npc.description: a stout man in a suit. He looks a bit dazed.
npc.intro: I am the Charles, the bank manager.

result.description: Curse the Gods! The bank has been robbed by Goblins. They came from underground and took everything in the vault! The town is ruined! Please help us get the town's riches back!
Please help recover the town's riches.

room.name: Central Park
room.description: You enter the city park. It is a large garden filled with flowers and shrubs of every kind imaginable. The centerpiece of the garden is a glorious tree that towers over the garden. Herds of small, fluffy animals are playing in the branches.

room.name: Church Basement
room.description: You enter the basement of the church. It isn't quite what you'd expect given the immaculate state of the main church. The basement is dark and moldy with water dripping down the walls. To the east is a door that says 'Enter the Test of Faith.' The stairs lead back up to the church.

move.description: Stairs leading up to the church's main worship area.
Door to the Test of Faith.

room.name: Test of Faith
room.description: As you step through the door, it closes behind you with a thud. You are stainding in an impossibly large cavern. A glowing yellow light illuminates the center of the cavern, but leaves the edges cloaked in shadows. You hear a low growl and the slithering sound of footsteps as a vicious-looking adult dragon emerges from the shadows. In a booming voice, it roars 'If you want to complete the Test of Faith, you must first DEFEAT ME!!!' It assumes a fighting stance, or so you assume. You've never seen a dragon in person before. To the north is a door that with 'Test of Strength' inscribed on it. The door to the south reads 'Test of Intellect.'

move.description: Door to the Test of Strength
Door to the Test of Intellect

room.name: Test of Intellect
room.description: You enter a white cube of a room. On the north wall is a green light. On the south wall is a red light. On the floor between the two lights is a row of eleven pedestals with spherical rocks on top of them. Each rock has a number etched on its surface. They are arranged in ascending order from the green side to the red. A voice, out of nowhere, says 'Pick a number from one to eleven. You get only four guesses.'

object.name: One
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number one inscribed on it.

object.name: Two
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number two inscribed on it.

object.name: Three
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number three inscribed on it.

object.name: Four
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number four inscribed on it.

object.name: Five
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number five inscribed on it.

result.description: The entire room glows gold. A voice says 'You have passed the Test of Intelligence! Proceed through the door.
The entire room glows gold. A voice says 'You have passed the Test of Intelligence! Proceed through the door.
The entire room glows gold. A voice says 'You have passed the Test of Intelligence! Proceed through the door.

object.name: Six
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number six inscribed on it.

object.name: Seven
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number seven inscribed on it.

object.name: Eight
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number eight inscribed on it.

object.name: Nine
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number nine inscribed on it.

object.name: Ten
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number ten inscribed on it.

object.name: Eleven
object.description: a spherical stone rock with the number eleven inscribed on it.

room.name: Test of Strength
room.description: The Test of Strength looks like a child's room, with a bed, chest of drawers, and a night table. On the bed is a foot tall toy rabbit. It cackles and shouts 'I am the strongest creature in the realm. Fight me to the death or fail the Test of Faith.' On the eastern wall of the room is what looks like closet door.

room.name: Completing the Test
room.description: You enter a small room upholstered with the same golden cloth that Theodore's robes are made of. In the center of the room is a bronze statue. Stairs lead up.

npc.name: Statue
npc.description: a bronze statue of Theodore. It is moving.
npc.intro: I am Theodore, the head priest of this glorius church. Welcome!

result.description: You have failed the Test of Faith. Return to the church.
Congratulations! You have passed the Test of Faith!

room.name: The Wizard Tower
room.description: A glowing door appears in the base of the tree and you go through it. You appear in a glorious looking entry way, with an intricate design made of gems built into the floor. A marble staircase leads up to the next floor. On the west wall is a door leading back out to the park

room.name: Bank Vault
room.description: The vault is in complete disarray. There isn't a single gold piece anywhere to be found and all of the deposit boxes have been emptied. A smoking hole leads down into the darkness from the center of the vault. A few fragments of goblin weapons are scattered about the floor.

room.name: Cave Entrance
room.description: You jump down into the cave. It is dark and hazy. A tunnel leads to the west.

room.name: Cave Tunnel
room.description: You follow the tunnel to the west. It looks like it keeps going down.

room.name: Cave Tunnel
room.description: You follow the tunnel to the west. It looks like it keeps going down. The bank vault is to the east.

room.name: Cave Tunnel
room.description: The tunnel west comes to and end. At the west end of the tunne is a wooden door, standing ajar. The bank vault is to the east.

room.name: Cavern Room
room.description: You enter a rectangular room carved out of the cavern. It is lit with torches hanging from the walls. Random furniture is scattered about. A large chest sits in the center of the room.

object.name: chest
object.description: a large wooden chest with golden handles and accent work.

result.description: You try to open the chest, but it comes alive and tries to bite you.

item.name: lantern
item.description: a lantern. It's a bit rusty, but it still works.

item.name: Ripper
item.description: a small dagger, glowing with magic.

item.name: Thelonius
item.description: a metal club, glowing with magic. The word 'Thelonius' is inscribed on the handle.

item.name: Phylactery
item.description: a small charm. It looks magical.

quest_step.description: Tommy has asked you to pick up the lantern from the table.
quest_step.hint: type 'take lantern' to pick up the lantern.

quest_step.description: Talk to Tommy to complete the quest.
Tommy has asked you to check out the storeroom.
quest_step.hint: type 'north' to go to the storeroom and check it out.

quest_step.description: Now that you have cleared out the storeroom, let Tommy know.
quest_step.hint: Go talk to Tommy and let him know you cleared out the storeroom.

quest_step.description: Theodore has instructed you to head down the stairs and pass a test of faith.

quest_step.description: Charles is begging you to get the town's rickes back from the goblins.
quest_step.hint: Head down into the tunnel in the vault.

monster.name: Imp
monster.description: what looks like the fiery manifestation of Hell...in a bite-sized package.

monster.name: Ratter
monster.description: a giant bi-pedal rat or a smallish furry man with a pointy nose. It's hard tell.

monster.name: Dragon
monster.description: an enormous, frothing dragon with flames erupting from its nose.

monster.name: Chester
monster.description: a large, wooden, angry chest...with pointy teeth.
